alert.note: Alert for Adair; Casey; Russell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:01AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT RUSSELL...SOUTH CENTRAL CASEY AND EAST CENTRAL ADAIR COUNTIES THROUGH 530 AM EDT/430 AM CDT/... At 501 AM EDT/401 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from Magnum to 9 miles east of Columbia. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Russell Springs, Jabez, Sycamore Flat, Eli, Whittle, Windsor, Webbs Cross Roads, Royville, and Esto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building. Frequent lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
